name: civiceye-fullstack
description: CivicEye - Full Stack Civic Issue Reporting Platform

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai_services && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,AI" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run setup:env
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint || true

author: CivicEye Team
